name: UFO Scavenger
description:
In this game you play as an alien in a spaceship and your mission is to search and collect as many items as you can, but there's a catch! Every item on this planet is cursed and every time you pick one up you will get a curse that will make things harder for you.

Controls:

Left, right and up key to steer

Shift to make your ship turn faster

Space to use beam to pick up items
